Introduction

Boys’ Republic is a five-member South Korean boy group under Universal Music Korea. They made their official debut on June 05, 2013 with the single 'Party Rock.'

In 2018, after five years of promotions, the group announced that they would be on an indefinite hiatus.

Current state:
in hiatus
